editorialDecl.p: This record created following the Syriaca.org guidelines. Documentation available at: http://syriaca.org/documentation.

interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.
Indicates the content is canonical, i.e., widely agreed upon. Abbreviations of work titles are primarily in view.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period
Names or terms Romanized into English according to the standards adopted by the Gorgias Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Syriac Heritage

bibl.title: 2 Corinthians (Peshitta Version)
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܦܘܠܘܣ ܕܠܘܬ ܩܘܪ̈ܝܢܬܝܐ ܕܬܪܬܝܢ
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܩܘܪ̈ܢܬܝܐ ܕܬܪܬܝܢ
2 Cor
2 Corinthians
ܐܶܓܰܪܬܳܐ ܕܦܰܘܠܳܘܣ ܕܰܠܘܳܬ ܩܘܽܪ̈ܺܝܢܬܳܝܶܐ ܕܬܰܪܬܶܝܢ
ܫܠܡ̣ܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܩܘܪ̈ܢܬܝܐ ܕܬܪܬܝܢ ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ ܐܦ ܗ̣ܝ ܡܢ ܦܝܠܝܦܘܣ ܡܕܝܢܬܐ. ܘܐܫܬܕܪܬ݂ ܒܝܕ ܛܛܘܣ ܘܠܘܩܐ. ܕܐܝܬ ܒܗ̇ ܦܬܓܡ̈ܐ̇ ܫܒܥܡܐܐ̣ ܘܫܒܥܝܢ. ܘ:ܘ.
The Epistle of 2 Corinthians, according to the Peshitta version
ܫܠ̣ܡܬ݀ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܩܘܪ̈ܢܬܝܐ ܕܬܪ̈ܬܝܢ ܕܐܬܟ̣ܬܒܬ݀ ܡܢ ܦܝܠ̣ܝܦܘܣ ܕܡܩܕ̈ܘܢܝܐ.
2 Corinthians, according to the Peshitta version
The Epistle of 2 Corinthians
ܐܓ݁ܪܬ݁ܐ ܕ݂ܠܘܬ݂ ܩܘܪ̈ܢܬ݂ܝܐ ܕ݂ܬ݂ܪ̈ܬ݁ܝܢ
ܐܶܓ݁ܰܪܬ݁ܳܐ ܕ݂ܰܠܘܳܬ݂ ܩܘܪ̈ܢܬ݂ܳܝܶܐ ܕ݂ܬ݂ܰܪ̈ܬ݁ܶܝܢ
The Second Epistle to the Corinthians
bibl.note: 2 Corinthians (Peshitta Version) is extant as early as the 5th-6th century and consistently circulates as one of the Pauline Epistles (Peshitta Version) .
ܦܿܘܠܘܣ ܫܠܝܚܐ ܕܿܝܫܘܼܥ ܡܫܝܚܐ ܒܿܨܒܼܝܢܗ ܕܿܐܠܗܐ܂ ܘܛܝܡܬܼܐܘܣ ܐܚܐ܃ ܠܥܕ̱ܿܬܿܐ ܕܿܐܠܗܐ ܕܿܐܝܬܼ ܒܿܩܘܪܢܬܼܘܣ܃ ܘܠܟܼܠܗܘܼܢ ܩܕܿܝܫܐ̈ ܕܿܐܝܬܼ ܒܿܐܟܼܐܝܐ ܟܿܠܗ܂
